page.title: 06EDUCATION IN COBHAM SURREY
page.content: {SECONDARY,}249 children, 11 classes, 12-16 years. 1 Head, 20 staff. No corporal punishment. Trips abroad & day outings. Uniform blue & white. Lunches. Football, cricket & netball teams, Swimming pool. {PRIVATE SCHOOL - GIRLS,}Over 200 girls, 7 classes, 17 staff. No corporal punishment. Uniform blue & gold. Lunch provided. Many clubs esp. music & dancing. Large grounds and school swimming pool. {PRIVATE SCHOOL - BOYS,}165 boys, 9 classes, 19 staff. Corporal punishment. Lunch provided. Uniform grey & white, boys under 11 yrs. or 5 foot wear short trousers. Many clubs, trips abroad, swimming pool, squash court and leisure centre. A boarding school. {ALL SCHOOLS}work 0900-1600 approx. 1 hour for lunch.
